amendment.description: To provide for the independent and objective conduct and supervision of audits and investigations relating to the programs and operations funded with amounts appropriated or otherwise made available to Ukraine for military, economic, and humanitarian aid.

action.text: Amendment SA 438 under the order of 7/26/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 20 - 78. Record Vote Number: 201.

Amendment SA 438 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3588-3589) To provide for the independent and objective conduct and supervision of audits and investigations relating to the programs and operations funded with amounts appropriated or otherwise made available to Ukraine for military, economic, and humanitarian aid.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 438 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 935.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 438 under the order of 7/26/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 20 - 78. Record Vote Number: 201.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 438 under the order of 7/26/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 20 - 78. Record Vote Number: 201.
